amendment.description: An amendment numbered 69 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds to move the U.S. Embassy in Israel out of Jerusalem.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 360 - 67 (Roll no. 491).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 360 - 67 (Roll no. 491).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
